About Me

BIO

After completing some online programming courses and finding real enjoyment in seeing code come to life in the browser, I decided to enrol myself with Northcoders. The boot camp gave me a solid fundamental understanding of the JavaScript language, introduced me to both the front-end and back-end disciplines, frameworks such as React/React Native and Agile methodology as well as various other concepts. Since graduating in 2018 I have set my focus almost exclusively on front-end development.
